GeneDef.label: psychic beacon
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are extremely psy-sensetive and can affect others' mood when talking to them.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Carriers of this gene have a 200% psychic sensetivity modifier.
Carriers of this gene will affect mood of whoever they're talking to based on their opinion of that person.

GeneDef.label: archite-infused unstable dna
GeneDef.description: Owner's DNA has been infused with destabilized archite particles, making it chaotically mutate every hour. Due to the destructive effects of rogue archites, the owner won't be able to survive for long.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Carriers of this gene will randomly lose or acquire 1-3 genes every hour.
Carriers of this gene cannot be genetically modified or scanned.
